name: April's Fool's Gold
description:
This game is made for the April Fool's game jam by Kyjor. It's got a little bit of puzzle and survival mix in it. If more people like this I will add more levels when and if I get the time

Controls

WSAD to move

Mouse to look

To play the game extract the ZIP file anywhere and run the  April'sFool'sGold.exe file

Have a happy April fool's day and blessed Easter and Holy Week!
